subject: Super Bowl
Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: San Francisco/Santa Clara and Houston will host the 50th and 51st Super Bowls, beating Miami, an indication that the N.F.L. is dissatisfied with the state of the Dolphins’ stadium.
snippet: San Francisco/Santa Clara and Houston will host the 50th and 51st Super Bowls, beating Miami, an indication that the N.F.L. is dissatisfied with the state of the Dolphins’ stadium.
